languages.text:
Hive world characters gain +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} if there are 3 or more creatures (allies or enemies) in a 3-cell radius.
Yet they suffer a −2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to resolve with no creatures around.
languages.original_text:
Персонаж с мира-улья получает +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}, если в радиусе 3 клеток от него находится 3 существа или более (как союзников, так и противников).
Если в этом радиусе никого нет, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} к решимости −2.

traits.locale_text:
Hive world characters gain +<u>((1 + FEL bonus) / 2)</u> resolve if there are 3 or more creatures (allies or enemies) in a 3-cell radius.
Yet they suffer a −2 penalty to resolve with no creatures around.

Hive world characters gain +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} if there are 3 or more creatures (allies or enemies) in a 3-cell radius.
Yet they suffer a −2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to resolve with no creatures around.

Hive world characters gain +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} if there are 3 or more creatures (allies or enemies) in a 3-cell radius.
Yet they suffer a −2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to resolve with no creatures around.

Hive world characters gain +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} if there are 3 or more creatures (allies or enemies) in a 3-cell radius.
Yet they suffer a −2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to resolve with no creatures around.

languages.text:
Makropolwelt-Charaktere erhalten +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}, wenn sich 3 oder mehr Kreaturen (Verbündete oder Gegner) in einem Radius von 3 Feldern befinden.
Allerdings erleiden sie einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −2 auf die Entschlossenheit, wenn keine Kreaturen in der Nähe sind.
languages.original_text:
Hive world characters gain +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} if there are 3 or more creatures (allies or enemies) in a 3-cell radius.
Yet they suffer a −2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to resolve with no creatures around.

traits.locale_text:
Makropolwelt-Charaktere erhalten +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}, wenn sich 3 oder mehr Kreaturen (Verbündete oder Gegner) in einem Radius von 3 Feldern befinden.
Allerdings erleiden sie einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −2 auf die Entschlossenheit, wenn keine Kreaturen in der Nähe sind.

Makropolwelt-Charaktere erhalten +<u>((1 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}) / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}, wenn sich 3 oder mehr Kreaturen (Verbündete oder Gegner) in einem Radius von 3 Feldern befinden.
Allerdings erleiden sie einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −2 auf die Entschlossenheit, wenn keine Kreaturen in der Nähe sind.

languages.text:
Les personnages des mondes ruches obtiennent +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} en présence d'au moins 3 créatures (alliées ou ennemies) dans un rayon de 3 cases.
En revanche, ils subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de détermination de −2 si aucune créature n'est présente aux alentours.
languages.original_text:
Hive world characters gain +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} if there are 3 or more creatures (allies or enemies) in a 3-cell radius.
Yet they suffer a −2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to resolve with no creatures around.

traits.locale_text:
Les personnages des mondes ruches obtiennent +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} en présence d'au moins 3 créatures (alliées ou ennemies) dans un rayon de 3 cases.
En revanche, ils subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de détermination de −2 si aucune créature n'est présente aux alentours.

Les personnages des mondes ruches bénéficient de +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} en présence d'un minimum de 3 créatures (alliées ou ennemies) dans un rayon de 3 cases.
En revanche, ils subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de détermination de -2 si aucune créature n'est présente aux alentours.

languages.text:
如果巢都世界的角色3格距离内有3名或更多生物（无论敌我），则会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，等同于{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249}
不过，如果周围没有任何生物，则巢都世界的角色会受到-2决心{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。
languages.original_text:
Hive world characters gain +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} if there are 3 or more creatures (allies or enemies) in a 3-cell radius.
Yet they suffer a −2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to resolve with no creatures around.

traits.locale_text:
如果巢都世界的角色3格距离内有3名或更多生物（无论敌我），则会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，等同于<u>（（1+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）/2）</u>
不过，如果周围没有任何生物，则巢都世界的角色会受到-2决心{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

如果巢都世界的角色3格距离内有3名或更多生物（无论敌我），则会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，等同于{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249}
不过，如果周围没有任何生物，则巢都世界的角色会受到-2决心{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

languages.text:
Los personajes de mundo colmena ganan +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} si hay 3 criaturas o más (sean aliados o enemigos) en un radio de 3 casillas.
Sin embargo, si no hay ninguna criatura cerca sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −2 a la firmeza.
languages.original_text:
Hive world characters gain +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} if there are 3 or more creatures (allies or enemies) in a 3-cell radius.
Yet they suffer a −2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to resolve with no creatures around.

traits.locale_text:
Los personajes de mundo colmena ganan +<u>((1 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g}) / 2)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} si hay 3 criaturas o más (sean aliados o enemigos) en un radio de 3 casillas.
Sin embargo, si no hay ninguna criatura cerca sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -2 a la firmeza.

Los personajes de mundo colmena ganan +{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249} de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} si hay 3 criaturas o más (sean aliados o enemigos) en un radio de 3 casillas.
Sin embargo, si no hay ninguna criatura cerca sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -2 a la firmeza.

languages.text:
過密惑星のキャラクターは、3セル以内に3体以上の生物（敵味方問わず）がいる場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+{uip|Resolve|33ece001a1ec47c19dca4ddc8435c249}される。
ただし、周囲に生物がいない場合、決断力に−2の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。
